group_1.textLeft: Thanks.

group_1.textRight: Maybe Torayamachi's right about Witches coming @back.

group_1.textLeft: We only came out here to see if Yuna really set up stones on the bridges.
It was a nice surprise to bump into a Witch.

group_1.textRight: So what are we gonna do?
Are you still planning on culling the number of @Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: You think I'm gonna change plans just 'cause we @ran into a single Witch?
Why are you askin' that all of a sudden?

group_1.textRight: Because that's not the reason you've been fighting, @is it?

group_1.textLeft: Not really.
Juri the Great just wants to crush Yuna.
Futatsugi was mine until she suddenly turned up @and stole it from me.
Not only did she defeat me, @she forced me to join her.
Can you imagine how miserable I was?
I swore to myself that I'd pay her back for that @eventually.

group_1.textRight: And now you've got a good excuse to do so, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
They say Witches are comin' back, but I can't take @that at face value.
So we're gonna keep knockin' down the number @of Magical Girls so we can keep going.
There's nothin' wrong with doing that, is there?

group_1.textRight: Hey, I'd rather do that than slowly @starve to death.

group_1.textLeft: Heehee. @You're such a weirdo, Ranka.
I'm sure most people would think I'm scum after @hearin' that.

group_1.textRight: I mean, I'm using your reputation for my own gains, @so I can't go pointing fingers.
Plus, like, now we know that girl who turned into a Witch wasn't lying.
Torayamachi trying to spy on us like that proves @they're willing to fight.
So we have no choice but to fight too, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Well, if you're down with it, I guess we can start @doin' things my way now.
...Let's tell the others to get ready.
We'll strike Torayamachi in two days.

group_1.textRight: But now that we've confirmed the stones here, @what should we do?
Are we gonna stick to the initial plan of using @East and West Oogibashi?

group_1.textLeft: Lemme think...

select.textSelect: Use the East and West Bridges
Use the East and West Bridges
